posts.message:
A company in Egypt is looking for senior SharePoint developers with the following qualifications:

1. 1+ years experience with SharePoint
2. Presentable (means you look good and can dress up). 
3. Very Good command of English
4. You will work with customers directly

mail me at msamy@Sufigeeks.org
